data.lyric:
[ti:Woman, Amen]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Country Cure]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Woman, Amen - Dierks Bentley
[00:05.56]Written by：Dierks Bentley/Ross Copperman/Josh Kear
[00:11.12]Producer：Ross Copperman
[00:16.69]I'd lose my way yeah I'd lose my mind
[00:20.49]If I faced one day on my own
[00:23.16]
[00:24.46]I know I was saved the night that she gave
[00:28.27]This drifter's heart a home
[00:31.01]
[00:32.53]Every night I should be on my knees
[00:36.62]Lord knows how lucky I am
[00:39.47]
[00:40.58]I'll never say it near enough
[00:44.23]Thank god for this woman amen
[00:47.44]
[00:56.51]This world has a way of shaking your faith
[01:00.19]I've been broken again and again
[01:03.13]
[01:04.05]But I need all the cracks in my shattered heart
[01:08.28]'Cause that's where her love gets in
[01:11.10]
[01:12.56]Every night I should be on my knees
[01:16.45]Lord knows how lucky I am
[01:19.45]
[01:20.51]I'll never say it near enough
[01:24.12]Thank god for this woman amen
[01:27.44]
[01:28.02]She gives me faith she gives me grace
[01:31.10]
[01:31.94]She gives me hope she gives me strength
[01:35.45]
[01:36.04]She gives me love love without end
[01:39.24]
[01:40.25]Thank god for this woman amen
[01:43.47]
[02:00.76]Thanks for the moon and the stars up above
[02:04.46]Forgiveness of sin and your undying love
[02:08.22]Every twist every turn for the way you made sure
[02:12.29]All my roads led to her
[02:15.00]
[02:15.84]So tonight I will fall down on my knees
[02:20.23]'Cause lord knows how lucky I am
[02:23.32]
[02:24.51]I'm gonna shout at the top of my lungs
[02:28.21]Thank god for this woman amen
[02:31.44]
[02:32.03]Yeah thank god for this woman amen
[02:35.95]She gives me faith she gives me grace
[02:39.15]
[02:39.90]She gives me hope she gives me strength
[02:44.01]She gives me love love without end
[02:47.41]
[02:48.15]Thank god for this woman amen
data.trans:
[ti:Woman, Amen]
[ar:Dierks Bentley]
[al:Country Cure]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.56]//
[00:11.12]//
[00:16.69]我将迷失方向 我将丧失理智
[00:20.49]如果有一天我孤立无援
[00:23.16]
[00:24.46]我知道那晚是她拯救了我
[00:28.27]给我这个漂泊者一个家
[00:31.01]
[00:32.53]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[00:36.62]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[00:39.47]
[00:40.58]我从没有这么近距离地表达过我的心声
[00:44.23]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[00:47.44]
[00:56.51]这个世界会动摇你的信念
[01:00.19]我曾一次又一次遭受打击
[01:03.13]
[01:04.05]纵使心被伤得支离破碎 我也需要一点缝隙
[01:08.28]这样她的爱就能照进我的心房
[01:11.10]
[01:12.56]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[01:16.45]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[01:19.45]
[01:20.51]我从没有这么近距离地表达过我的心声
[01:24.12]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[01:27.44]
[01:28.02]她给予我信念 她给予我恩典
[01:31.10]
[01:31.94]她给予我希望 她给予我力量
[01:35.45]
[01:36.04]她给予我爱 无止尽的爱
[01:39.24]
[01:40.25]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[01:43.47]
[02:00.76]感谢月亮 感谢星辰
[02:04.46]宽恕罪恶 你永恒的爱围绕着我
[02:08.22]尽管我脚下的路曲曲折折
[02:12.29]最终都通向她所在的地方
[02:15.00]
[02:15.84]每个夜晚我都会虔诚祈祷
[02:20.23]只有上帝知道我有多幸运
[02:23.32]
[02:24.51]我将竭尽全力呼喊
[02:28.21]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[02:31.44]
[02:32.03]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
[02:35.95]她给予我信念 她给予我恩典
[02:39.15]
[02:39.90]她给予我希望 她给予我力量
[02:44.01]她给予我爱 无止尽的爱
[02:47.41]
[02:48.15]感谢上帝将她送到我身边 阿门
